thread.title: Cup Noodles debuts new flavor: Everything Bagel with Cream Cheese
thread.title_full: Cup Noodles debuts new flavor: Everything Bagel with Cream Cheese

author: Bryan Ke
title: Cup Noodles debuts new flavor: Everything Bagel with Cream Cheese
text: Cup Noodles debuts new flavor: Everything Bagel with Cream Cheese Nissin Foods USA announced it will be releasing its newest ramen flavor, Everything Bagel with Cream Cheese, next week. Key points: [Nissin](/tag/nissin)unveiled the new product in a [press release](https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/cup-noodles-everything-bagel-with-cream-cheese-takes-a-bite-out-of-bagel-culture-302105912.html)on Tuesday. The company also teased the Everything Bagel with Cream Cheese [Cup Noodle](/tag/cup-noodles)in a post on - The latest product is seemingly a follow-up to the company’s [breakfast-themed flavor](/nissin-cup-noodles-breakfast)from 2023, the Maple Syrup Pancakes, Sausage and Egg Cup Noodles. The details: - The new Cup Noodle product incorporates the trendy everything bagel seasoning inside the serving, which contains sesame seeds, poppy seeds, garlic, dried onion and caraway seeds. - The new ramen contains a cream-cheese flavored sauce, making the instant dish saucy instead of soup-based. - “Consumers have been adding a dash of Everything Seasoning to their ramen since the craze took off and we took inspiration from our consumer base to give everyone’s favorite noodles a creamy twist,” Priscila Stanton, Nissin Foods senior vice president of marketing said. - The new Cup Noodle variant was announced as being exclusively available at [Walmart](/tag/walmart)next week. - The Everything Bagel with Cream Cheese Cup Noodle is available for a suggested retail price of $1.18. How people reacted: - Some Instagram users’ reaction were split between disbelief and optimism, with one user writing, “Most normal cup noodle post.” Another user commented under Nissin’s post, “This might smack.” - One user thought the post was Nissin’s attempt to pull off an April Fools’ prank, commenting, “April fools is over!! smh lol.” - “Imagine if the og cup noodles had THE og cream cheese in this,” Philadelphia Original cream cheese’s Instagram page commented.
